author: nero_eth
content: The CL doesn't even store the full payload (e.g. CLs may blind transactions + BAL), so it's ok for the CL to not have the BAL readily available. If unavailable at the CL but within the WSP, then the CL can use the existing engine api method to request it from the EL - just like CLs to with ExecutionBodies today.
